entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 70 percent chance of flurries this evening then partly cloudy. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light overnight. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy near noon with 60 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning and minus 4 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Snow ending overnight then partly cloudy. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 4 in the evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 1 April 2023
